name: Gorillost And Found
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021

You are a gorilla working at a lost and found office. Do your best.
Your goal is to get different jungle animals their requested items.
Everything in the office is very fragile and you have to be extremely careful when lifting items with your strong gorilla hands.

This is a very early prototype and a testing project for another gorilla game in early development. 

Credits:
Aapo Nikkola 3D artist
Aissa Nylund Character artist
Mikko Österman Programmer
Tuomas Järvenkylä Music and Sound effects

This is a VR game and was made with Rift S headset, the game should work on any VR device, but cannot be guaranteed.
